contexts.context: ...the founders of 'modern' art, were in being <mark>born</mark> when they were,so that they came to manhood before...
...the founders of 'modern' art, were in being <mark>born</mark> when they were,so that they came to manhood before...
...smile at weddings Where bride and bridegroom Were both <mark>born</mark> since the Shadow Lifted,or rather Moved elsewhere. Never...
